mpicxx -fPIC -g -Wall -Wno-deprecated-declarations -Wsign-compare -std=c++11 -Wall -O0 -DTHREAD -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -libverbs -lfuse -L/usr/local/lib/libfuse.so -shared -Wl,-soname,libnrfsc.so -o libnrfsc.so CMakeFiles/nrfsc.dir/src/client/JavaApiImpl.cpp.o CMakeFiles/nrfsc.dir/src/client/libnrfs.cpp.o CMakeFiles/nrfsc.dir/src/client/nrfs.cpp.o CMakeFiles/nrfsc.dir/src/fs/TxManager.cpp.o CMakeFiles/nrfsc.dir/src/fs/bitmap.cpp.o CMakeFiles/nrfsc.dir/src/fs/dmfs.cpp.o CMakeFiles/nrfsc.dir/src/fs/filesystem.cpp.o CMakeFiles/nrfsc.dir/src/fs/hashtable.cpp.o CMakeFiles/nrfsc.dir/src/fs/lock.cpp.o CMakeFiles/nrfsc.dir/src/fs/storage.cpp.o CMakeFiles/nrfsc.dir/src/net/Configuration.cpp.o CMakeFiles/nrfsc.dir/src/net/RPCClient.cpp.o CMakeFiles/nrfsc.dir/src/net/RPCServer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/nrfsc.dir/src/net/RdmaSocket.cpp.o CMakeFiles/nrfsc.dir/src/net/mempool.cpp.o CMakeFiles/nrfsc.dir/src/tools/debug.cpp.o  -lcrypto -lcryptopp -ldl
